entries.original: As of https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1594, we now stream the response from the model in the TUI and when using `codex exec`
entries.translated: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1594에 따라 이제 TUI와 `codex exec`을 사용할 때 모델의 응답을 스트리밍합니다.

entries.original: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1589 changes `ctrl-d` so it only exits the TUI if the composer is empty (it will still exit the TUI if the composer is hidden because the Codex agent is thinking)
entries.translated: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1589는 `ctrl-d`를 수정하여 작곡가가 비어 있을 때만 TUI를 종료하도록 변경합니다 (Codex 에이전트가 생각 중이라 작곡가가 숨겨진 경우에는 여전히 TUI를 종료합니다).

entries.original: As a heads up, https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1596 changes the organization of the `~/.codex/sessions` folder so it has `YYYY/MM/DD` subfolders. This should make it easier to find recent sessions and avoid degrading filesystem performance because previously `~/.codex/sessions` could end up with an unbounded number of entries
entries.translated: 참고로, https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1596는 `~/.codex/sessions` 폴더의 구성을 `YYYY/MM/DD` 하위 폴더로 변경합니다. 이는 최근 세션을 찾기 쉽게 하고, 이전에는 `~/.codex/sessions`에 무제한의 항목이 있을 수 있어 파일 시스템 성능이 저하되는 것을 방지합니다.

entries.original: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1571 fixes a longstanding issue where we failed to handle long MCP tool names gracefully (https://github.com/openai/codex/issues/1289 was the relevant GitHub issue)
entries.translated: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1571는 긴 MCP 도구 이름을 우아하게 처리하지 못했던 오래된 문제를 해결합니다 (관련 GitHub 문제는 https://github.com/openai/codex/issues/1289입니다).

entries.original: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1603 introduced a `--json` flag to `codex exec` so that it prints output as JSONL to stdout
entries.translated: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1603는 `--json` 플래그를 `codex exec`에 도입하여 출력이 stdout에 JSONL로 출력되도록 합니다.

entries.original: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1590 tries to ensure that when the Codex CLI is launched via the Node.js script in the `npm` version that both the Codex CLI process and Node.js process exit together, though from the additional details on https://github.com/openai/codex/issues/1570, it seems like it is not sufficient to fix that specific problem.
entries.translated: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1590는 `npm` 버전의 Node.js 스크립트를 통해 Codex CLI가 실행될 때 Codex CLI 프로세스와 Node.js 프로세스가 함께 종료되도록 보장하려고 합니다. 그러나 https://github.com/openai/codex/issues/1570의 추가 세부 정보를 보면, 이 특정 문제를 해결하기에는 충분하지 않은 것 같습니다.

entries.original: Though https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1590 should make it so that, on Windows, the `npm` version will fall back to the TypeScript version (for now) rather than just crashing, fixing https://github.com/openai/codex/issues/1573.
entries.translated: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1590는 Windows에서 `npm` 버전이 단순히 충돌하는 대신 TypeScript 버전으로 대체되도록 하여 https://github.com/openai/codex/issues/1573을 해결해야 합니다.
